result.execSummary:
The defendant Jason Aaron BECK was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Deliver Heroin within 1000 feet of school-2nd or subsequent offense (<3g), a class F felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(1)(d)1.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

superMiscConds.notes: If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.
AODA assessment and follow through counseling.

Pay supervision fees in an amount to be determined by the Department of Corrections.

Maintain absolute sobriety.

Assessment, treatment, counseling as deemed appropriate by the Department's assessment process.

Obtain mental health assessment and follow through.  

Use only one doctor for prescriptions and only one pharmacy to fill prescriptions.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

records.addlTxt:
Defendant in custody.   
State moves to delete the penalty enhancer on Count 1.   Motion granted.    Deliver Heroin - No contest plea.   Convicted.   Court orders a pre-sentence investigation report to be completed by DOC.   Report is due on 08-25-16.   Sentencing hearing is set for 09-01-16 at 2:30 p.m.   Defendant must submit DNA sample.   Court orders defendant's bail revoked.    
Minutes.

Defendant in custody.
Plea Date set for 06-15-2016 at 2:30 p.m., Br. 1.

Attorney LaBre advises the Court the defendant has rejected the offer.
New charges have since been filed (in 16CF341).
Status conference set for 06-06-16 at 11:30 a.m.
Minutes.
Notice of Intent to Introduce Recorded Communications
Submitted by Jacalyn LaBre
State's Witness List
State's Motion in Limine
Jury trial at 06-01-2016 08:30 am
Pre-trial conference at 05-27-2016 02:00 pm

Settlement Conference Summary.
Scheduling Conference is set for 02-18-2016 at 9:30 a.m., Br. 1.
Scheduling conference at 02-18-2016 09:30 am
Settlement Conference set for 01-28-2016 at 4:00 p.m.

Order Modifying Bond.
The Court now orders that the defendant's bond be reduced to $500.00 cash.
Cover letter.

ADDRESS INFO for Jason Aaron BECK
Current: 1040 South 25th Street, Manitowoc, WI 54220 United States  (Effective: 11-05-2015)
Prior: Manitowoc County Jail, Manitowoc, WI 54220

$500.00 cash bail furnished.
Notice to Party Furnishing Cash Bail Bond.
State's Motion and Demand for Discovery.

Defendant in custody.
Defendant waives his right to a preliminary hearing.  Defendant is bound over to Circuit Court Branch 1 for further proceedings.   Waiver of Right to Preliminary Hearing.
ARRAIGNMENT
Information filed.  Not guilty plea(s).  Jury Calendar.  Settlement conference with the District Attorney is set for 12-10-15 at 3:30 p.m.  State's Motion and Demand for Discovery.
BAIL MODIFICATION HEARING
Defendant requests bail be reduced to $250.00 cash.  State objects and gives defendant's criminal history.
Court modifies bond to $500.00 cash with the same conditions.
Minutes.

Motion to Modify Bond.  
Cover Letter.

Defendant in custody.
Attorney Pangburn informs the Court that he was just appointed on this matter and hasnt had a chance to speak to the defendant yet.  He is requesting an adjournment.
The defendant waives the statutory time period within which a preliminary hearing must be held.
Preliminary hearing is reset to 11-04-15 at 2:30 p.m.
Minutes.
Cover letter.
Eric Pangburn, through public defender.
Defendant's Demand and Motion for Discovery and Inspection.
Defendant's Notice of Motion.
It is hereby ordered that Ann M. Larson is allowed to withdraw as attorney of record for the defendant an a new attorney shall be appointed.
Petition to Withdraw as Counsel of Record.

Attorney Larson files a Petition and Order to Withdraw as Counsel. Court grants petition and signs Order.
Preliminary Hearing reset to 10-28-2015 at 1:30 p.m.

Letter from defendant to Judge Rohrer requesting bail modification.
Letter from Judge Rohrer to counsel.
Ann Larson, public defender.

Defendant in custody.   
Defendant demands a preliminary hearing.   Preliminary hearing is set for 10-21-15 at 2:00 p.m.   
Minutes.

Defendant in custody.  The State informs the Court that the defendant will be charged with the crime of deliver heroin within 1000 feet of school as repeater.  The matter is continued for initial appearance on 10-12-15 at 2:30 p.m.  Bail is set at $1,000.00 cash with the condition that he maintain absolute sobriety from alcohol and drugs. Bail not furnished and the defendant is remanded into custody.  Commitment for failure to furnish bail issued.  Copy filed.
Minutes.
RE:  Deliver heroin within 1000 feet of school-2nd or subsequent offense, on 06-03-15.
